quote: The reason open houses don't work is because you're not hosting open houses. You're just hanging out in the house on a Saturday afternoon.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the common belief that open houses are ineffective.
suggested_hook: Think open houses don't work? Think again!

quote: I just asked one favor though. Can you meet me by the kitchen counter before you leave? So I can ask you a few questions about the home.
why_clipworthy: Provides a specific tactic to engage open house visitors.
suggested_hook: Want to convert more open house visitors? Here's a simple tactic.
